column2: This child resembles its family - but the subtle differences will determine how others respond to [GetHerHis] appearance.
One can only hope for the best.
As this child begins to feed and grow, you begin to see indications of [GetHerHis] future physical strength and stamina.
May [GetSheHe] become as fit and vigorous as the heroes of old!
As this child interacts with the world, you learn whether or not [GetSheHe] takes after [GetHerHis] parents in mental ability.
Pray [GetSheHe] has learned from [GetHerHis] family even while in the womb
As this child begins to feed and grow, you begin to see indications of [GetHerHis] future height.
May [GetSheHe] grow as tall of stature as the heroes of old!
As this child begins to feed and grow, you begin to see indications of [GetHerHis] future physical agility and stamina.
May [GetSheHe] become as fit and vigorous as the heroes of old!

You may have suffered a serious injury to one of your eyes.
Unfortunately you have forever lost complete vision from your left eye.
Unfortunately you have forever lost complete vision from your right eye.
The scare has passed and fortunately your eyesight has remained strong. There is no threat of vision loss.
Sadly your one good eye was recently injured. There is a smacll chance that you may be blinded.
Thankfully vision has returned to your remaining good eye.
Sadly as each day goes by your vision has not returned. You have become blinded.
You may have injured one of your eyes, but as vision has left you long ago you are not concerned.
